I’m excited to share that I recently passed the **AI-900 exam** and earned the **Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Fundamentals** certification!

This certification validates a foundational understanding of artificial intelligence (AI) concepts and how they are implemented in Microsoft Azure. It covers key areas such as:

- **AI workloads and considerations** – understanding responsible AI and core principles.
- **Machine learning fundamentals** – types of machine learning, training, and evaluation.
- **Computer vision** – image classification, object detection, and facial recognition.
- **Natural language processing (NLP)** – analyzing text, translation, sentiment analysis, and more.
- **Conversational AI** – building intelligent chatbots and virtual agents.

For me, this journey was not only about achieving a certification, but also about deepening my knowledge of how AI can be applied across industries and workloads. AI is transforming the way we build applications, improve customer experiences, and drive innovation—and Microsoft Azure provides powerful tools to make it accessible to everyone.

I highly recommend this certification to anyone who wants to get started with AI and learn how Azure AI services like **Azure Cognitive Services, Azure Machine Learning, and Azure OpenAI Service** can help bring intelligent solutions to life. It’s a great entry point for both technical and non-technical professionals. It is a great way of learning about the AI fundamentals and understanding some of the key concepts.

This is another step in my continuous learning journey, and I’m excited to keep building on this foundation as AI becomes an even bigger part.

👉 If you’re interested in starting your own journey, you can learn more about the **AI-900: Microsoft Azure AI Fundamentals** certification here.
